title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio built with React and Vite showcasing projects, blog posts, and a responsive design.

title: Todo App
description: A lightweight todo application with localStorage persistence, filters, and drag-and-drop reordering.

title: Realtime Chat
description: A realtime chat app using WebSockets with user rooms, typing indicators, and message history.

title: E-commerce Store
description: A sample e-commerce storefront with product listings, cart, checkout flow, and Stripe integration.

title: Data Visualizer
description: Interactive charts and dashboards built with D3 and Recharts for visualizing large datasets.

title: UI Component Library
description: A reusable UI component library with theming, accessible primitives, and Storybook documentation.
